languages.text: "Не слушай тетю. Тетя спятила. Основательно так съехала с катушек. Слушайся старших, хорошо завтракай, не отрезай дедушке голову".
"Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."
languages.original_text: "Не слушай тетю. Тетя спятила. Основательно так съехала с катушек. Слушайся старших, хорошо завтракай, не отрезай дедушке голову".

traits.locale_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

languages.text: «No hagas caso a esa señora; está majareta. En serio, le falta un tornillo. Haz caso a tus mayores: cómete el desayuno y no le cortes la cabeza a tu abuelo».
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

traits.locale_text: «No hagas caso a esa señora; está majareta. En serio, le falta un tornillo. Haz caso a tus mayores: cómete el desayuno y no le cortes la cabeza a tu abuelo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あの女の言うことは聞くな。あの女は頭がおかしい。正気を失っている。年長者の言うことを聞き、朝食を食べ、おじいちゃんの首を切るな」
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

traits.locale_text: 「あの女の言うことは聞くな。あの女は頭がおかしい。正気を失っている。年長者の言うことを聞き、朝食を食べ、おじいちゃんの首を切るな」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “别听那个姑娘胡说八道，她脑子有病，已经彻底疯了。记得听长辈的话，好好吃早饭。还有，别砍你爷爷的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

traits.locale_text: “别听那个姑娘胡说八道，她脑子有病，已经彻底疯了。记得听长辈的话，好好吃早饭。还有，别砍你爷爷的脑袋。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hört nicht auf die Dame. Die Dame ist verrückt. Also, komplett durchgeknallt. Hört auf Eure Ältesten, esst Euer Frühstück und enthauptet Euren Großvater nicht."
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

traits.locale_text: "Hört nicht auf die Dame. Die Dame ist verrückt. Also, komplett durchgeknallt. Hört auf Eure Ältesten, esst Euer Frühstück und enthauptet Euren Großvater nicht."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « N'écoute pas ce que dit la dame. Elle est folle. Complètement givrée, même. Écoute plutôt tes aînés, mange ton petit-déjeuner et laisse la tête de ton grand-père où elle est. »
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."

traits.locale_text: « N'écoute pas ce que dit la dame. Elle est folle. Complètement givrée, même. Écoute plutôt tes aînés, mange ton petit-déjeuner et laisse la tête de ton grand-père où elle est. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sen ablayı dinleme. Abla aklını kaçırmış. Ciddi ciddi kafadan birkaç tahta eksilmiş. Sen büyüklerini dinle, kahvaltını yap ve büyükbabanın kafasını kesme."
languages.original_text: "Don't listen to the lady. The lady is nuts. Like, properly off her rocker. Listen to your elders, eat your breakfast, and don't cut off your grandpa's head."
